content: I can't predict the future or have personal thoughts, but it's worth noting that as filmmakers gain more recognition and opportunities in the industry, they may face pressure to conform to mainstream tastes and expectations. however, many directors have managed to maintain their unique visions and styles even as they gain more widespread recognition. it's ultimately up to the individual filmmaker to decide how to navigate these challenges, but it's certainly possible to maintain one's artistic integrity while also achieving commercial success.
